game.title: The Last Hope - Ragnarök's Conquest
game.synopsis: Amidst the chaos and darkness, a valiant hero embarks on a race against time to stop Ragnarök and restore balance to the universe. In this epic tale, every action holds the weight of an uncertain future.
game.beginning: As the world's last remnants crumble, the heroes set out on their perilous journey.
game.ending: Their ultimate victory brings about a bittersweet new era, marked by loss but hope for a brighter tomorrow."
